answers.answer: Oh wow never heard of it but would definitely like you to let us know what they say! Crazy wow. I hope all is OK!

I will... everyone keeps saying i look like im carrying twins but i didnt think that was possible to miss with todays technology. Ive had four ultrasounds because they can never get a clear picture of my baby because he moves so much, so theres no way right? They couldnt have missed a second baby

I sure have. I measured at 35 weeks when I was 27 weeks and kept measuring big. No diabetes, healthy and baby was healthy. I had 7 or 8 ultrasounds with my son cause I always measured big. I hope everything goes well
Thank you, it feels better to know I'm not alone.

They could have. My sitter went in and they seen one and next appointment seen two and then next appoinent found a third one. I was still bigger then her and I had a single pregnancy. Her girls were born on my sons first bday.

I hate that they do that and I don't pay attention to it. They kept moving my due date because of the size of my daughter. She was born 4 days before her original due date because of an unrelated emergency. She was 9.11 lbs, some babies are just big. But hey who knows
See my doctor asked me if my due date could have been wrong, but im positive when my last period was.

question: I went in at 26 weeks and my doc measured my tummy and i was 4 weeks bigger then I'm supposed to be but had only gained 2 pounds. Then two weeks later i went in and im 28 weeks and measure as if i was 35 weeks, and didnt gain any weight.  Thats 7 weeks! Im going in Tuesday for a emergency ultrasound but im going crazy. Has anyone gone throughth is?? Is my baby okay??
title: 7 weeks ahead of schdule?
